ygData.subject: The Seige

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

       Hell Beast broke off first, with Rampahe, Tankkor, and Inferno close 
behinde. The four took positions to the north of the ship, where several 
smoldering pot holes filled the ground. 
       "Blast it." He said over his comm unit to all of his army. Tankkor, 
Rampage, Inferno, and after he sent the message, Hell Beast fired on the CF.

       Gremlin, Pheniox, Aerostreak, and Craken soared 200 meters above the 
Cybertronian Fire. Hell Beast's message was recevied, and the four lowered 
themselfs and sent an arial attack on the vessle.

       Trarantulas, Waspinator, Aquarious, and Adrax took western positions. 
Receving Hell Beast's command they too opend fire on the sole target.

       Aquarious, Black Aracnia, Bezerker, and Quickstrike took easten 
positions and did the same as the latter.

       Jackle, Klash, Nighteyes, and Marine took the southern positions and 
fired on the ship.

       The Predacon force led by Hell Beast for the Neo Decepticon Empire 
pummled the Cybertronian Fire. Each Predacon was armed with a plasma assault 
riffle, as well as there own coustom weapons. The plasma riffles however 
would add an extra kick into this attack, and inflict some interesting damage.


--part1_4b.a001863.2804c050_boundary
